metadata.name: Antibirth music++
metadata.description:
Now updated with 18 new tracks from Antibirth Vol. 3, which covers most of the AB+ content!
This mod replaces almost all music (alt repentance floors/repentance endgame content excluded) in the game with Mudeth's compositions.
[i]*not compatible with mods that change music.xml* [/i] (example aside some music mods: Dad Insults Edmund When You Die)
[b] Features/Differences from other Antibirth Music Mods: [/b]
[u] Music: [/u] [i] Full Versions of [/i] - "Hallowed Ground" (Downpour) - "Lucidate" (Library)
[i] Layered Version of [/i] - "the Thief" (Cathedral)
[i] New Music for [/i] - Mega Satan ("The Flagbearer") - Tainted Menu ("Descent") - Ultra Secret Room ("Forgotten Lullaby" with reverb) - Game Over ("Journey from a Jar to the Sky") - Credits/Alt Credits ("Underscore"/[url=https://twitter.com/htedum/status/1402159446336307200]"Take Me Back Home"[/url] ) - 11th Wave in Greed Mode (Alt of "Tandava") [i][url=https://docs.google.com/document/d/19049NXcudS0LmyQG6S3X4MdHwnR3J9DK1PwtB0tASmY/edit?usp=sharing] Full tracklist [/url][/i] [u] Tweaks: [/u] [i] The Void Music plays from a random starting point [/i] [i] Random music for ordinary bosses in the Void:[/i] - [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puXaqP8FAbY] "My Innermost Apocalypse" [/url] Metal Cover by ToxicxEternity - "Divine Combat" by Danny Baranowsky - "The Future" by Ridiculon - [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CaFWiZhpCzY&list=PL5nw9e8ptkQgWTht1eiK6FZcq7i6QpSNg&index=2] "Morituros" [/url] Metal Cover by Andrew Malefice - "Twelve" by Mudeth [i] Alternative starting point for Blue Baby and Satan (random chance of playing)[/i] [i] DannyB's "$4cR1f1c14_" plays with a small chance in arcade [/i] [i] Story Boss Intros like in Antibirth for the majority of story bosses [b] Check out the content that was used: [/b] [url=https://mudeth.bandcamp.com/album/antibirth-ost] Antibirth Soundtrack [/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ul-FVgyLPMI&t=2721s] Spears 'n' Spades Soundtrack [/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puXaqP8FAbY] ToxicxEternity's My Innermost Apocalypse Cover [/url] [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CaFWiZhpCzY&list=PL5nw9e8ptkQgWTht1eiK6FZcq7i6QpSNg&index=2] Andrew Malefice's "Morituros" Cover [/url]
[b] Antibirth mods recommendations: [/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487751430]Antibirth Styled Logo [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2502235092]Antibirth Game Intro with new credits [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2465748203] Better Mausoleum Graphics [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2462799075]More minimalistic Antibirth Music mod [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2489813335] DannyB + Mudeth music mod [/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2497871141] AB+ version of this mod [/url]
